ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmhmlem.k | |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) |
| 2 |  | lmhmlem.l | |- L = ( Scalar ` T ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_lmhmlem | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprrd | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> L = K ) |
